2. glomerular tuft: A glomerulus is a cluster of blood vessels in the kidney that forms the filtration unit of the nephron, the basic functional unit of the kidney. The glomerular tuft refers to the cluster of glomeruli in the kidney.
3. cortex: The cortex is the outer layer of the kidney, which is responsible for filtering waste products from the blood.
4. nephrogenic zone / cortical zone ratio: This is a measure of the ratio of the nephrogenic zone (the area of the kidney responsible for filtering waste products) to the cortical zone (the outer layer of the kidney).
